item.title: Movies Recommendation with Hierarchical Poisson Factorization in Edward
item.dc:creator: Dada Romeo
item.description:
Introduction

In this article, we will explore an implementation on the Hierarchical Factorization (HPF) model in Edward. This implementation will use the movilens 2k dataset to learn latent features that try to capture the preferences and attributes of users and movies respectively. The code is avalaible on github.

Read more… (9 min remaining to read)

item.title: The Voice Afrique Tweets Mining Part 4
item.dc:creator: Dada Romeo
item.description:
Sentiment Analysis

Previously, we explore topic modeling an algorithm used to discover what users are talking about. But often, its not important to know what users are saying, but how they are saying it. Sentiment analysis seeks to automatically associate a piece of text with a sentiment score, a positive or negative emotional score. Aggregating sentiment can give an idea of how people are responding to an event or a topic.

Read more… (10 min remaining to read)
